scripts.start: npm run build && npm run postbuild && electron .
scripts.package-mac: npm run build && npm run postbuild && @electron/packager . --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=app/icons/app.icns --prune=true --out=release_builds
scripts.package-win: npm run build && npm run postbuild && @electron/packager . whoisdigger --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=app/icons/app.ico --prune=true --out=release_builds --version-string.CompanyName="WhoisTeam" --version-string.FileDescription="WhoisTeam Whoisdigger" --version-string.ProductName="whoisdigger"
scripts.package-linux: npm run build && npm run postbuild && @electron/packager . whoisdigger --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=app/icons/app.png --prune=true --out=release_builds
scripts.package-all: npm run build && npm run postbuild && @electron/packager . --all --overwrite --asar --icon=app/icons/app.png --prune=true --out=release_builds
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run postbuild && concurrently "npm:watch" "npm:watch-assets" "electronmon ."
